1631920972_15nqVJAHdxk2KxMwvCp4iiXfj4BtY.body: I know not many like it, but I like how easy it is to use freenet. It works as easy as tor maybe easier. but it does save a random chunk of the servers to your pc. So you have no clue what is in it, but it is encrypted and temporary. You have to allow to download anything.
